jdbc.query

Class ReportsQueries

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdbc.query.ReportsQueries

  • public class ReportsQueries
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages database operations related to generating and retrieving reports for parks. This includes daily summaries, usage reports, cancellation reports, and total visitor amount reports. The class supports operations like generating new reports, inserting report data into the database, and fetching existing reports as PDF blobs.
    Author:
    Tamer Amer, Gal Bitton, Rabea Lahham, Bahaldeen Swied, Ron Sisso, Nadav Reubens.

    • Method Detail

      • getParkDailySummaryByDay

        public ParkDailySummary getParkDailySummaryByDay(int month,
                                                 int day,
                                                 int parkId)
        Retrieves a summary of daily activities for a specified park on a given day and month. The summary includes total cancelled orders, time passed orders, and the total number of orders.
        Parameters:
        month - The month for which the summary is requested.
        day - The day for which the summary is requested.
        parkId - The ID of the park for which the summary is requested.
        Returns:
        A ParkDailySummary object containing the summary for the given day, or null if an error occurs.

      • getIfParkWasFullEachDay

        public ParkFullDaySummary getIfParkWasFullEachDay(int month,
                                                  int hour,
                                                  int year,
                                                  ParkNameEnum park)
        Checks if the park was full for each day of a given month and year, at a specific hour. This method is useful for understanding peak times and planning accordingly.
        Parameters:
        month - The month of interest.
        hour - The hour of interest.
        year - The year of interest.
        park - The ParkNameEnum representing the park of interest.
        Returns:
        A ParkFullDaySummary detailing the number of times the park was full during the specified hour across the month.

      • generateUsageReport

        public boolean generateUsageReport(UsageReport report)
        Generates a usage report for a specific park, month, and year. The report includes details on park fullness at various times throughout the month.
        Parameters:
        report - The UsageReport object containing parameters for report generation.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully generated and saved, false otherwise.

      • insertGeneratedUsageReportToDatabase

        private boolean insertGeneratedUsageReportToDatabase(UsageReport report)
        Inserts a generated usage report into the database. If a report for the same park, year, and month already exists, it updates the existing record.
        Parameters:
        report - The UsageReport to insert into the database.
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise.

      • getRequestedUsageReport

        public byte[] getRequestedUsageReport(UsageReport report)
        Retrieves the blob content of a previously generated usage report from the database.
        Parameters:
        report - The UsageReport identifying the report to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the PDF content of the report, or null if the report could not be found or an error occurred.

      • getAmountDivisionByOrderTypeInChoosenMonth

        public ParkAmountSummary getAmountDivisionByOrderTypeInChoosenMonth(int month,
                                                                    int parkId,
                                                                    int year)
        Retrieves the total amounts divided by order type (Solo, Family, Group) for a specific park in a given month and year. This method aggregates the amounts from both occasional visits and preorders that have been marked as 'Completed'. The results are then summarized in a ParkAmountSummary object, which includes the total amounts for each order type, as well as the month, year, and park ID for which the summary was generated.
        Parameters:
        month - The month for which the summary is to be generated.
        parkId - The ID of the park for which the summary is to be generated.
        year - The year for which the summary is to be generated.
        Returns:
        A ParkAmountSummary object containing the total amounts for Solo, Family, and Group orders, or null if an SQL exception occurs during the operation. If no data is found for the specified criteria, a ParkAmountSummary with all amounts set to 0 is returned.

      • generateCancellationsReport

        public boolean generateCancellationsReport(CancellationsReport report)
        Generates a report detailing the cancellations for a given park, month, and year.
        Parameters:
        report - The CancellationsReport containing the parameters for report generation.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully generated and saved, false otherwise.

      • generateVisitsReport

        public boolean generateVisitsReport(VisitsReport report)
        Generates a visits report for a given park, month, and year, including details on the number of visitors by type and visit duration.
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport to be generated.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully generated and saved, false otherwise.

      • generateTotalAmountDivisionReport

        public boolean generateTotalAmountDivisionReport(AmountDivisionReport report)
        Generates a report that divides the total amount of visitors by their type (e.g., Solo, Family, Group) for a given park, month, and year.
        Parameters:
        report - The AmountDivisionReport containing the parameters for the report generation.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully generated and saved, false otherwise.

      • getParkVisitsSummaryByEnterTime

        private boolean getParkVisitsSummaryByEnterTime(VisitsReport report)
        Calculates the summary of park visits based on the time of entry, segmented into hourly intervals for various types of visits. This method combines data from both occasional visits and preorders, categorizing them by their respective order types (e.g., Solo Occasional, Family Preorder) and then aggregating the total number of visitors for each hourly interval throughout the day. The results are then stored in a map within the provided VisitsReport object, categorized by order type and time interval.
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport object to which the calculated summary will be added. This report must include the park ID, month, and year for which the visit summary is requested.
        Returns:
        true if the operation successfully retrieves and processes the data, adding the resulting summary to the report; false if an SQL exception occurs or no data is found for the specified criteria.

      • getParkIdleVisitTimeSummary

        private boolean getParkIdleVisitTimeSummary(VisitsReport report)
        Retrieves a summary of visitor idle times by type for a given park, month, and year. This method aggregates the duration visitors spent in the park, categorized into intervals, and differentiates between types of visits (Solo, Family, Group) and their methods of entry (Occasional, Preorder).
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport object that includes park identification and the time frame for the report.
        Returns:
        true if the summary was successfully retrieved and set in the report object, false if there was an error or no data.

      • insertGeneratedCancellationsReportToDatabase

        private boolean insertGeneratedCancellationsReportToDatabase(CancellationsReport report)
        Inserts or updates a generated cancellations report into the database for a specific park, month, and year. This method ensures that only one report exists for a given time period and park by overwriting any existing report.
        Parameters:
        report - The CancellationsReport containing the generated report details including the park, time frame, and the PDF blob.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully inserted or updated in the database, false otherwise.

      • insertVisitsAmountReportToDatabase

        private boolean insertVisitsAmountReportToDatabase(VisitsReport report)
        Inserts or updates a generated visits amount report into the database for a specified park, month, and year. Utilizes the ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mechanism to ensure unique reports per time period and park, updating existing entries if necessary.
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport containing details of the generated report including park information, time frame, and the PDF content.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully inserted or updated in the database, false in case of any errors.

      • insertTotalAmountReportToDatabase

        private boolean insertTotalAmountReportToDatabase(AmountDivisionReport report)
        Inserts or updates the generated total amount division report into the database for a designated park, month, and year. If a report for the specified criteria already exists, it updates the existing record with the new PDF content.
        Parameters:
        report - The AmountDivisionReport containing the generated report's details, such as park ID, time frame, and the report's PDF blob.
        Returns:
        true if the report was successfully inserted or updated, false if the operation failed.

      • getRequestedCancellationsReport

        public byte[] getRequestedCancellationsReport(CancellationsReport report)
        Retrieves the blob content of a previously generated cancellations report from the database.
        Parameters:
        report - The CancellationsReport identifying the report to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the PDF content of the report, or null if the report could not be found or an error occurred.

      • getRequestedVisitsReport

        public byte[] getRequestedVisitsReport(VisitsReport report)
        Retrieves the blob content of a previously generated visits report from the database.
        Parameters:
        report - The VisitsReport identifying the report to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the PDF content of the report, or null if the report could not be found or an error occurred.

      • getRequestedTotalAmountReport

        public byte[] getRequestedTotalAmountReport(AmountDivisionReport report)
        Retrieves the blob content of a previously generated total amount division report from the database.
        Parameters:
        report - The AmountDivisionReport identifying the report to retrieve.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes representing the PDF content of the report, or null if the report could not be found or an error occurred.
